conversation.content: I want a high-energy movie with robots and epic battles.
Are you looking for something set in a modern world or something with a historical twist?
A mix of history and sci-fi with lots of action would be perfect!
You should definitely watch Transformers: The Last Knight! 🤖⚔️ It has intense robot battles, a cool blend of history with sci-fi, and tons of action to keep you on the edge of your seat! 🎬
